channel.title: Apache Con US on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in Apache Con US on Inductive Bias

item.title: Apache Con drawing closer
item.description: Apache Con drawing closer # By November I will be traveling to Oakland - for me it is the first Apache Con US ever. And the first Apache Con I will be giving a talk in one of the main tracks: I will be presenting Apache Mahout, give an overview of the project, of our current status and explain which problems can be solved with the current implementation. The talks will conclude with an outlook to upcoming tasks and features our users can expect in the near future.
